title: Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Web Dispatcher and SAP Netweaver AS for ABAP Vulnerability

sentences: Impact
titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Web Dispatcher and SAP Netweaver AS for ABAP Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Web Dispatcher and SAP Netweaver AS for ABAP Vulnerability

sentences: Current SAP customers should refer to SAP note for patch information, available from the SAP Web site (login required).
SAP ABAP Server of SAP NetWeaver<crlf>SAP Web Dispatcher 7.85<crlf>SAP Web Dispatcher 7.53<crlf>SAP Web Dispatcher 7.77
SAP Website

SAP Web Dispatcher and SAP Netweaver AS for ABAP and Java (ICM) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the in administration UI. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.
SAP
